ai-thag5.5:1.1_0: Actually, it turned out to be a good thing,
ai-thag5.5:1.2_0: how my mother spurred me on.
ai-thag5.5:2.2_0: master of the three knowledges, seer of the deathless.
ai-thag5.5:2.3_0: I’ve conquered the army of Namuci,
ai-thag5.5:3.1_0: Those defilements that were found in me,
ai-thag5.5:3.3_0: are all cut off without remainder,
ai-thag5.5:4.4_0: that no entanglements are found in you.”
ai-thag5.5:5.2_0: this bag of bones is their last.
ai-thag5.5:5.4_0: now there’ll be no more future lives.”
